title: Marty
description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: Rebel Without a Cause
description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

title: East of Eden
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A willful young man vies for the love of his religious father and reconciles with his estranged mother.

title: The Seven Year Itch
description: A faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor who moves in upstairs while his family is away for the summer.

title: To Catch a Thief
description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

title: The Night of the Hunter
description: A self-proclaimed preacher marries a gullible widow whose young children know where their late father hid $10,000 in stolen loot.

title: Guys and Dolls
description: A gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a craps game.

title: Lady and the Tramp
description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

title: Picnic
description: A drifter's arrival in a small Kansas town on Labor Day disrupts the lives of its residents.

title: The Man with the Golden Arm
description: A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction.

title: Mister Roberts
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: In the waning days of World War II, the cargo officer of a naval supply ship chafes at being stuck behind the lines while his friends are fighting.

title: Bad Day at Black Rock
description: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessed by a terrible past they want to keep secret.

title: Blackboard Jungle
description: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

title: Oklahoma!
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: In the Oklahoma territory at the turn of the twentieth century, two young cowboys vie with an evil ranch hand and a traveling peddler for the hearts of the women they love.

title: Kiss Me Deadly
description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

title: Summertime
description: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome-but-married Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

title: The Rose Tattoo
description: After her truck driver husband dies, a dressmaker in Louisiana withdraws from the world, until she meets another truck driver who reminds her of her late husband.

title: Love Is a Many-Splendored Thing
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A widowed Eurasian doctor falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Civil War.

title: Diabolique
description: The wife and mistress of a loathsome school principal hatch a plot to kill him, but after they drown him in a bathtub, his body disappears.

title: Rififi
description: Four men plan a technically complex jewel heist, but human frailty threatens to doom the plan.

title: Ordet
description: A family of farmers in western Denmark is torn apart by faith, religion, and love.

title: Pather Panchali
description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

title: Smiles of a Summer Night
description: In turn-of-the-century Sweden, four couples meet at a country estate, and a comedy of manners ensues.

title: All That Heaven Allows
description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

title: The Trouble with Harry
description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what needs to be done with his body.

title: The Ladykillers
description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

title: Richard III
description: Richard, Duke of Gloucester, stops at nothing to become the King of England.

title: Lola Montès
description: The life of the famous dancer and courtesan Lola Montès is told in a circus setting.

title: The Big Knife
description: A popular Hollywood actor is blackmailed by a studio boss into renewing his contract under threat of exposing a past crime.

title: The Desperate Hours
description: Three escaped convicts take a suburban family hostage in their own home.

title: It's Always Fair Weather
description: Three World War II buddies agree to meet in ten years, but when the reunion happens, they discover they have nothing in common.

title: Tarantula
description: A spider escapes from an isolated desert laboratory and grows to gigantic proportions, wreaking havoc on the local town.

title: This Island Earth
description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

title: Moonfleet
description: A young boy discovers that the mentor he loves is a smuggler.

title: The Long Gray Line
description: Marty Maher, an Irish immigrant, becomes a non-commissioned officer and athletic instructor at West Point.

title: Strategic Air Command
description: A professional baseball player is recalled to military service to fly B-36 and B-47 bombers for the Strategic Air Command.

title: To Hell and Back
description: The true story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history, who plays himself in this biographical war film.

title: The Man from Laramie
description: A stranger defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of their oldest rivals.

title: Violent Saturday
description: Three men plot to rob a bank in a small mining town, while the lives of the townspeople intersect.

title: The Big Combo
description: A police lieutenant goes after a powerful mob boss, obsessively trying to get something on him.

title: Killer's Kiss
description: A washed-up boxer protects a dancer from her rapacious boss, leading to a confrontation.

title: The Phenix City Story
description: A prosecutor tries to clean up a vice-ridden Alabama town.

title: I'll Cry Tomorrow
description: The biography of Lillian Roth, a Broadway star who descends into alcoholism after the death of her fiancé.

title: Love Me or Leave Me
description: The story of Ruth Etting, a singer who rises from a taxi dancer to movie star with the help of a gangster.

title: We're No Angels
description: Three convicts escape from Devil's Island and hide out in the home of a kindly shopkeeper and his family, whom they decide to help.

title: The Tender Trap
description: A womanizing theatrical agent finds himself falling for a young actress who wants marriage and a career.

title: Samurai II: Duel at Ichijoji Temple
description: Musashi Miyamoto returns to Kyoto after years of isolation and training to challenge the Yoshioka School.

title: Floating Clouds
description: A married forester meets a young woman in Indochina during WWII, and they continue their affair back in Japan, where they face poverty and despair.

title: Daddy Long Legs
description: A wealthy American supports an 18-year-old French orphan girl through college, anonymously.

title: The Quatermass Xperiment
description: Three astronauts are launched into space, but when the ship returns, only one is still aboard, and he has been infected by an alien organism.
